analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xc1e20543f90673ce56864dbec6bc8cca3a2c411d.sol:
	Contract Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xc1e20543f90673ce56864dbec6bc8cca3a2c411d.sol#658-661)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
